title: Fashfunk
author: Fashfunk
content: Hey guys,It’s my first post here. I just found this forum yesterday because I was researching on 1xbit and spent the night reading threads about 1xbit scams. I used 1xbet (with an E) for a long time and I loved the variety they had in sports, so 1xbit seemed like the obvious choice for my first crypto sports book. You see, I usually bet on smaller sports, or lower divisions. So 1xbet used to suit me perfectly.  Unfortunately it doesn’t seem like 1xbit is a good idea. Lots and lots (lots!) of complains around here. One thing I commonly saw more experienced users say on those threads was something like “you have so many good and trustworthy casinos out there, why would you go to 1xbit given it’s reputation”?I totally understand where this is coming from, but most of us had absolutely no idea about all the scams and complains against them. And besides that, we don’t know any more. How do I find the good and trustworthy when I have to look through dozens or hundreds of different casinos. I’ve been reading lists and lists and researching dozens of casinos but I can’t reach any conclusion.So I decided to create this topic to see if the community wants to help a newbie. A newbie who is very concerned right now after reading all the horror stories around here. Please give me some names if you don’t mind helping. Don’t point me out to more lists. I’ve been there form hours now. Which casinos are overall loved around here?Which one is safe to deposit my money on? Which one is your personal favorite?The only must is for it to have sportsbook. That’s what I am interested in. Oh and to be safe and honest. That’s also a must

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You can check the gambling board on this forum which is the board you even post this thread, you will see trustworthy casinos and other gambling sites there:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0The casinos have individual thread which is active.Out of all the casinos there, as you have known, avoid 1xbit. You can see my signature, https://livecasino.io, it is a gambling site link, it is new though but started with an excellent reputation, you can try it out. Others like Stake, Rollbit, Duelbit, Roobet and many others are trustworthy.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Since you're talking about sportsbook then I will answer about sportsbook too without mention slots or other games.Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?Sportsbet.io and Stake, they're have so many players and become the biggest sportsbook in this forum.QuoteWhich one is safe to deposit my money on? The casino that already survive for many years, trustworthy and have a responsive support. In this forum you check the topic author of each thread and if the account get so many red tagged, it's obviously a scam casino. So many casinos is trustworthy here.QuoteWhich one is your personal favorite?Sportsbet.io and Fortunejack because I don't have any problem so far using this both sportsbook, usually each of them have some difference odds and I took advantages of it.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Sure you will find many reliable sportsbooks here, moreover you compared to sportsbook that has many scam acusitions so it's not hard to find it.Mostly I'm betting on duelbits, gamdom or roobet, besides that there is stake, that have good reputations and it's not worth to trust your fund in bookies that has worse reputations.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Maybe true or Not, i can see you are deliberately wanting to promote the good names of 1xbit after saying you have gone through lot of post which many users not just users but reputable individuals who has in one way associated their selves with site and give their feedback concerning their actions to them over here and you still come up saying all this??You still need to do more findings about them. Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?Which one is safe to deposit my money on?Which one is your personal favorite?The Gambling discussion section will solve your question

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?Sportsbet.io, Stake, Crypto.Games, Fortunejack.com, bitcasino.io and many more. There are many casinos who were able to create a positive brand value and slowly they became big in crypto currency niche.QuoteWhich one is safe to deposit my money on? All above with not mentioned many. However please do your own due diligence without trusting anyone's opinion.QuoteWhich one is your personal favorite?Sportsbet.ioI don't gamble these days but I loved my experience with them.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: 1xbit is being operated by scammers. and they are scamming since 2017 - You took a good decision not to use this website. And decided to look for such platforms that are honest with its users therefore I've found some casinos for you that have good reputation on the forum and if their users ever face problem then they try to issues as soon as possible.Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMThe only must is for it to have sportsbook.You can choose one of them.Roobet.comFreeBitco.inDuelbits.comRollbit.comStake.com

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: You don't exactly need to look that far, there are a few threads in here (or in Gambling Discussion) that has detailed lists about trustworthy casinos and their reputation. I myself personally use (or used rather) this onehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5262141.0For my specific choices, I'd go for Stake, Roobet, or Rollbit. I've also tried Wolfbet in the past so that's also a go for me. For sportsbooks then Sportsbet and Stake. They're all pretty safe afaik, some issues have come up here and there but afaik the supports have responded to them quite well (I didn't personally experience any issue so I have no qualms really).

comments.author: fiulpro
comments.body: For me what works is : Stake ( since many sports book do not allow the usage in UK therefore it has worked well ) Sportsbet.io (I have used it not that many times but a few therefore you can definitely look in their thread and get the whole idea as well) You might have to filter the sports book according to where you live since some of them won't be serving customers from some areas. Try and avoid the use of VPN as well and other than that 1xbit has to sort their problems out asap till then you should try one of these..

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Here you go!- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5319144.0But mostly, Fortunejack, Sportsbet, Stake and Roobet are the common casino recommendations here. You can also cross reference your pick on a gambling site review like this one[1].[1] https://gamblingbro.com/

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?Which one is safe to deposit my money on? Which one is your personal favorite?You're lucky that you're playing there and not yet scammed but you will soon if you keep on playing so it's good that you asked what's alternatives to 1XBIT I can recommend a lot of casinos, we have a handful of good and reputable casinos here, my shortlist are Betcoin, Betfury, Owlgames, and Duelbits, but it's better that you check the gambling section and check comments and reviews of their players, and my advice to you is to stop playing on 1XBIT someday it will catch up with you and scam you.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMPlease give me some names if you don’t mind helping. Don’t point me out to more lists. I’ve been there form hours now.I have a bad feeling, it seems you are not a newbie who just found out about this forum, as well as about sportsbooks, your question leads to a trap, I'm sure you already know many sports sites that you think are good and safe.I dare not recommend a safe sports book to you, my advice there are dozens of sports book sites operating on this forum, if you spend some time researching 1xbit, Of course I'm more sure you have one more night to see here, a sports site that is suitable and safe for you.Your three questions are even more dangerous.Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?This seems like a researcher, who wants to know something.The answer is, we all like casinos, except: there are some casinos that have a bad reputation, including 1xbit.Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich one is safe to deposit my money on?Nothing is safe for the money you deposit in gambling sites, its safest in the bank.Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich one is your personal favorite?Favorite casino honest, responsible and good reputation.1xbit not.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?not sure which is "loved" overall but stake.com is a pretty popular crypto casino. they also have sports betting in case you are interested. there is also duelbits who have been around the forum for almost two years now. they also have sports betting on their gambling site.Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich one is safe to deposit my money on?can't really recommend to you which casino is "safest to deposit on" since a lot of casinos here had their fair share of scam accusations(fake or not) from gamblers. yes, including the most popular ones. but I can say that you'd be better off depositing on gambling sites that have been here for a long time and has not much of a scam accusation.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMHey guys,It’s my first post here. I just found this forum yesterday because I was researching on 1xbit and spent the night reading threads about 1xbit scams. I used 1xbet (with an E) for a long time and I loved the variety they had in sports, so 1xbit seemed like the obvious choice for my first crypto sports book. You see, I usually bet on smaller sports, or lower divisions. So 1xbet used to suit me perfectly.  Unfortunately it doesn’t seem like 1xbit is a good idea. Lots and lots (lots!) of complains around here. One thing I commonly saw more experienced users say on those threads was something like “you have so many good and trustworthy casinos out there, why would you go to 1xbit given it’s reputation”?I totally understand where this is coming from, but most of us had absolutely no idea about all the scams and complains against them. And besides that, we don’t know any more. How do I find the good and trustworthy when I have to look through dozens or hundreds of different casinos. That’s what I am interested in. Oh and to be safe and honest. That’s also a must  Welcome to bitcointalk.org. I'm really sad to read about the bad experience you've had with 1xbit, but anyway, we learn from our mistake. Now that you're here, you can read about thread of every casino you reputeinteresting. I can advice to you casino like stake.com, bch.games, wintomato, or Gxgbet (these 3 are relatively new), but there are also other platform like rollbit, duel bits, ecc. it depends also on what you're looking foras game.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: 1xbit has a long problem that the casino has a bad and bad reputation you should see all the accusations then you will understand about the cases that often arise, for me avoid going to safer casinos.Bitcasino, Sporstsbet, Fortunejack, Duelbits, Roobet, Stake.com, Rollbit are safe casinos and already have a sportsbook in it, I think your money will be safe there, as long as you don't keep it longer.Check out the other reviews, check out the advice from other people it will open you to the right doors with their preferred casino of course by including those they have played there.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Of course, you can use the search for ratings of bookmakers, but here it was difficult to find ratings without being in the leaders of 1xbet, it is usually present, so it is better to rely on the reviews of real users, but I would not give advice.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?i can't speak for all forum members, tastes are relative, so the most important thing is what you want and expect from a casino and not what other people love in a casinoQuote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich one is safe to deposit my money on? there are many old casinos on this forum that are safe to deposit and play, i recommend stake.com they are the best casino in my opinionQuote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich one is your personal favorite?my favorite casino is stake.com and i'm not talking because i'm participating in their subscription campaign, i use stake.com every day to place my sports bets and i can assure you they are the best in the industryQuote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMThe only must is for it to have sportsbook. That’s what I am interested in. Oh and to be safe and honest. That’s also a must  you are asking these questions because you want to choose a casino that has sports betting, but you have to know that each person has their own opinion i recommend that you test every reliable and old casino on this forum, start by testing stake.com and if you like it stake.com then you are placing your bets at stake

comments.author: Hamphser
comments.body: Quote from: Fashfunk on June 28, 2022, 09:35:21 AMWhich casinos are overall loved around here?Which one is safe to deposit my money on? comments.author: BitcoinAccepted
comments.body: I think the op means something else when he means to find an alternative to 1xbit. The 1xbit software on their platform is very powerful and has a very wide range of sporting events. I think there are several sites that run on the same api, but I'm not sure if they are all based on the use of crypto. The sites indicated by people are also good alternatives, but in terms of offer it is a lot less than 1xbit.
